00043 #define CALL_SECTION "[Call]"
00044 
00046 #define COMP_SECTION "[Comp]"

00069 /*
00070  * Deallocate any memory for all the class members and initialize them back to
00071  * null or zero values.
00072  */
00073 void CMSKFileData::Clear()
00074 {
00075         m_strArrayType = "";
00076         m_Indicies.clear();
00077         m_Sets.clear();
00078 }

00082 /*
00083  * Check for the file existance
00084  */
00085 bool CMSKFileData::Exists()
00086 {
00087         // Find the file stats.
00088         struct stat st;
00089         return (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00090 }

00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Read the file contents.
00096  */
00097 bool CMSKFileData::Read()
00098 {
00099         // Clear any existing data.
00100         Clear();
00101 
00102         // Open the mask file.
00103         ifstream instream(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in);
00104         if (!instream)
00105         {
00106                 Clear();
00107                 m_strError = "Unable to open the mask file.";
00108                 return false;
00109         }
00110 
00111         // The first line is the array type
00112         const int LINELENGTH = 1024;
00113         char str[LINELENGTH];
00114         instream.getline(str, LINELENGTH);
00115         m_strArrayType = str;
00116 
00117 
00118         // Search for the call or comp sections.
00119         bool bCallSectionFound = false;
00120         bool bCompSectionFound = false;
00121         while (instream.getline(str, LINELENGTH))
00122         {
00123                 // Skip blank lines.
00124                 if (strlen(str) == 0)
00125                         continue;
00126 
00127                 // If the call section is found then continue with the while loop.
00128                 // Set the flags to start processing lines as from the call section
00129                 // and stop processing lines as from the comp section.
00130                 if (strncmp(str, CALL_SECTION, strlen(CALL_SECTION)) == 0)
00131                 {
00132                         bCallSectionFound = true;
00133                         bCompSectionFound = false;
00134                         continue;
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 // If the comp section is found then continue with the while loop.
00138                 // Set the flags to start processing lines as from the comp section
00139                 // and stop processing lines as from the call section.
00140                 if (strncmp(str, COMP_SECTION, strlen(COMP_SECTION)) == 0)
00141                 {
00142                         bCallSectionFound = false;
00143                         bCompSectionFound = true;
00144                         continue;
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 // Parse the call section line.
00148                 if (bCallSectionFound)
00149                 {
00150                         // Get the probe set name.
00151                         char *token = strtok(str, "\t");
00152                         ProbeSetIndiciesType indicies;
00153                         indicies.probeSetName = token;
00154 
00155                         // Get the mask values.
00156                         char *maskValues = strtok(NULL, "\t");
00157 
00158                         // Loop over all the mask pairs (start-stop).
00159                         char *maskEntry;
00160                         while ((maskEntry = strtok(maskValues, ",")) != NULL)
00161                         {
00162                                 // Extract the first and last index from the token.
00163                                 int first=0;
00164                                 int last=0;
00165                                 if (sscanf(maskEntry, "%d-%d", &first, &last) == 1)
00166                                         last = first;
00167                                 maskValues = NULL;
00168 
00169                                 // The indicies are one based in the mask file. Convert them to zero based
00170                                 // and store them in the list.
00171                                 for (int i=first-1; i<last; i++)
00172                                 {
00173                                         indicies.indicies.push_back(i);
00174                                 }
00175                         }
00176                         m_Indicies.push_back(indicies);
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 else if (bCompSectionFound)
00180                 {
00181                         m_Sets.push_back(strtok(str, "\t"));
00182                 }
00183         }
00184         return true;
00185 }

00189 void CMSKFileData::GetProbeSetIndiciesIterators(ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &end)
00190 {
00191         begin = m_Indicies.begin();
00192         end = m_Indicies.end();
00193 }
00194 
00196 
00197 void CMSKFileData::GetProbeSetIterators(ProbeSetListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetListConstIt &end)
00198 {
00199         begin = m_Sets.begin();
00200         end = m_Sets.end();
00201 }
